QuestData.Title: Maybe When You're Older
QuestData.Description:
<Pa'ku squints down at the young pterrordax.>
Well, I am out of ideas. My son will take you back to the nest. Do not worry, this one can fly.
YOUR little one will need to get back on his own. It builds character.
Maybe he will grow out of this absurd deficiency in time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to the nest at Pterror Rise.
